Black Pepper G&TTiffanie Barriere shows us her own spin on a Bombay & Tonic with a strawberry and black peppercorn syrup for a sweet and spicy G&T.By BOMBAY SAPPHIRE® GINApril 3, 20213.7(3)Read ReviewsTriangleEmailPinterestPrintTed + Chelsea CavanaughEmailPinterestPrintEmailPinterestPrintIngredients1½oz. Bombay Sapphire3oz. premium tonic water2cups water1cup granulated sugar1cup hulled and chopped strawberries1Tbsp. black peppercorns, crushed1oz. strawberry black pepper syrup (recipe follows)LimePreparationStep 1Combine water, sugar, strawberries and crushed black peppercorn in a small saucepan. Cover and bring to a simmer for 5 minutes. Remove from heat and allow to cool. Strain off solids.Step 2In a large balloon glass, squeeze the lime into the glass, then add the strawberry syrup and Bombay Sapphire Gin. Stir. Fill the glass with ice. Add tonic, stirring as you pour. Step 3Garnish with strawberry and lime. Click to Shop Bombay Sapphire NowBE BRILLIANT AND INSPIRED. DRINK RESPONSIBLY!©2021.
